item.description:
Fri May 27 -Eight To The Bar Motown Dance Party and Buffet with CTPartyClub.com

Listening to Eight to the Bar is a lot like driving along a time-warped highway where the car radio picks up everything from Can’t Hurry Love to Wanna Be Startin’ Something. Their material, like their outlandish wardrobes and onstage choreo, is a colorful mix of sixties through eighties Motown.

With their female vocals, saxophone, guitar, bass, keyboards and drums, this unique sextet pack a musical and visual wallop not seen in New England since the group's inception in 1975. Since that time they have released ten recordings, seven videos, have appeared nationally on HBO, VH-1, and have excited audiences from Europe to the Caribbean. At this time the band has released its eleventh CD, The Romper Room, (now being played on radio stations nationwide) and has returned from a 5-country European tour.

Tom Smith, New Haven Advocate

Visit www.EightToTheBar.com

8pm -9:30pm – Cugino’s Famous Italian Buffet

Tickets are $25 and include Full Italian Buffet

Advance Ticket Discount – only $20 at www.CTPartyClub.com

Tickets for Eight To The Bar after 9:30 pm are $8 at the door

Don’t miss this FUN night at Cugino’s- featuring a HUGE wooden dance floor, loads of FREE parking, and fabulous Italian buffet!

TABLE AND SEATING RESERVATIONS ARE AVAILABLE

Italian Buffet Featuring:

Chicken Cacciatore
Pasta Primavera
Specialty Pizza with Toppings (including Veggie Pizza)
Roast Beef
Roast Pork
Salad
Italian Bread
Coffee and Desert served after Buffet

Don’t miss this great night at of Great Food and Music with the CT Party Club at Cugino’s

Cugino’s Restaurant
1410 Highland Ave. (Rte 10)
Cheshire, CT 06410
Exit 3 off 691

FREE SAFE PARKING

CTMatch.com will have a private seating area – join us in the CTMatch.com section and meet other Local Singles!

Visit www.CTPartyClub.com
(860) FUN-5151
(860) 386-5151

Be the first to know about our NEW EVENTS
– Visit http://www.CTPartyClub.com/Join-Us.htm and sign up for our Email Newsletter
